String.Dst: Dism++ can be considered as an GUI version of DISM, WinSxS Clean, Installer Clean, Add Update and Drive...
Dism++,Dism GUI,WinSxS Cleanup,Windows Update Cleanup Tool,System Cleanup,Windows Update Clean,vista,win7,win8,win8.1,win10,Chuyu,dism,Add Update
The first Dism GUI implementation based on CBS in the world!
Dism++ can be considered as an GUI version of DISM, but it does not depend on MS DISM, and based directly on the lower-level CBS( Component Based Servicing Reference ).
Open source is not only a spirit, but also a symbol of strength. View the Chuyu Team's open source project Check Me。
Save up 33% space without slimming down OS.
No worrying for trans format ESD to ISO.
My Windows Update, my way~~Worry-free updates.
Warm backup for OS, Warm restore without PE!

Actually we are all some obsessive in late period, simply requesting a tool that is light, practical, straightforward, not malwaring, not pretending pity and not nagging. No result for some time but we didn’t give up as we realize such a dream with our own hands by building up Dism++: a small tool non-profit, not artificial, not herd-following, built with purely persistence and enthusiasts.
wsusscn2.cab is the Dism++ Windows Update Database, you can overwrite "Config\wsusscn2.cab" with it.
